options.content:
- Use Cases: This dashboard is to overview the Git and project management metrics.
- Data Source Required: Jira + GitHub, or Jira + GitLab.

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(distinct i.id)
from
  issues i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
where
  pm.project_name in (${project}) and
  i.priority in (${priority}) and
  i.type = 'BUG' and
  date(i.created_date) between STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH;

with _issues as(
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(i.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(distinct i.id) as defect_count
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project}) and
    i.priority in (${priority})
    and i.type = 'BUG'
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
)

select
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  defect_count
from _issues
order by time asc

select 
  avg(lead_time_minutes/1440) as value
from issues i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
where 
  pm.project_name in (${project}) and
  i.type in (${type})
  and i.status = 'DONE'
  and i.resolution_date between STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH;

panels.title: Mean Issue Lead Time in Days [Issues Resolved in $month]

targets.rawSql:
with _issues as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(i.resolution_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(i.resolution_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    AVG(i.lead_time_minutes/1440) as issue_lead_time
  FROM issues i
	  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  WHERE
    pm.project_name in (${project})
    and i.status = "DONE"
    and $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
    and i.resolution_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by 1
)

SELECT 
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  issue_lead_time as "Mean Requirement Lead Time in Days"
FROM _issues
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Mean Requirement Lead Time in Days [Of Issues Resolved per Month]

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(distinct author_name)
from
  commits c
  join repo_commits rc on c.sha = rc.commit_sha
  join project_mapping pm on rc.repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
where
  date(authored_date) between STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH
  and pm.project_name in (${project})

with _developers as(
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(c.authored_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(c.authored_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(distinct author_name) as developer_count
  from
    commits c
    join repo_commits rc on c.sha = rc.commit_sha
    join project_mapping pm on rc.repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  where
    $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
    and c.authored_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  group by time
)

select
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  developer_count
from _developers
order by time asc

with _num_issues_with_sprint_updated as (
  select
    NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT i.id), 0) AS num_issues_with_sprint_updated
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
    join issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project}) and
    c.field_name = 'Sprint' and
    c.original_from_value != '' and
    c.original_to_value != '' and
    date(i.created_date) between
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH
),

_total_num_issues as (
  select
    NULLIF(COUNT(distinct i.id), 0) as total_num_issues
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project}) and
    date(i.created_date) between
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH
)

select
  now() as time,
  100 - 100 * (select 1.0 * num_issues_with_sprint_updated from _num_issues_with_sprint_updated) / (select total_num_issues from _total_num_issues) as ratio;

with _num_issues_with_sprint_updated as (
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(i.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT i.id), 0) AS num_issues_with_sprint_updated
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
    join issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project}) and
    c.field_name = 'Sprint'
    and c.original_from_value != '' 
    and c.original_to_value != ''
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
),

_total_num_issues as (
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(i.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    NULLIF(COUNT(distinct i.id), 0) as total_num_issues
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project}) and
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
)

select
  x.time,
  100 - 100 * (1.0 * x.num_issues_with_sprint_updated / y.total_num_issues) as delivery_rate
from 
  _num_issues_with_sprint_updated x 
  join _total_num_issues y on x.time = y.time

select
  count(distinct pr.id)
from
  pull_requests pr
  join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
where
  pr.merged_date is not null 
  and date(pr.merged_date) between
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d')
  and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH
  and pm.project_name in (${project});

with _merged_prs as(
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(pr.merged_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(pr.merged_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(distinct pr.id) as pr_merged_count
  from
    pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project})
    and pr.merged_date is not null
    and $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    and pr.merged_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
)

select
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  pr_merged_count
from _merged_prs
order by time asc

select 
  100*count(distinct case when pr.id in (select pull_request_id from pull_request_issues) then pr.id else null end)/count(distinct pr.id) as unlinked_pr_rate
from pull_requests pr
join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
where 
  pm.project_name in (${project})
  and date(pr.created_date) between STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH

select
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  100*count(distinct case when pr.id in (select pull_request_id from pull_request_issues) then pr.id else null end)/count(distinct pr.id) as unlinked_pr_rate
from pull_requests pr
join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
where pm.project_name in (${project})
and $__timeFilter(created_date)
and created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
group by time

with _commits_groupby_name_and_date as (
  select
    author_name,
    date(authored_date) as _day,
    count(distinct c.sha)
  from
    commits c
    join repo_commits rc on c.sha = rc.commit_sha
    join project_mapping pm on rc.repo_id = pm.row_id
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project}) and
    WEEKDAY(authored_date) between 0 and 4 and
    date(authored_date) between
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH
  group by
  author_name, date(authored_date)
)

select 100 * count(*) / (count(distinct author_name) * count(distinct _day))
from _commits_groupby_name_and_date;

with _commits_groupby_name_and_date as (
  select
    author_name,
    date(authored_date) as _day,
    count(distinct c.sha)
  from
    commits c
    join repo_commits rc on c.sha = rc.commit_sha
    join project_mapping pm on rc.repo_id = pm.row_id
  where
    pm.project_name in (${project}) and
    (WEEKDAY(authored_date) between 0 and 4)
    and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
    and authored_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by 1,2
)

select
  DATE_ADD(_day, INTERVAL -DAY(_day)+1 DAY) as time,
  100*count(*)/(count(distinct author_name) * count(distinct _day)) as working_days_percentatages_per_month
from _commits_groupby_name_and_date
group by time

panels.title: Percentage of Coding Days Each Month

targets.rawSql:
select
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date) / 1440)
from
  pull_requests pr
  join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
where
  pm.project_name in (${project}) and
  pr.merged_date is not null
  and date(pr.created_date) between
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') 
    and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH

select
  DATE_ADD(date(pr.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(pr.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date) / 1440) as pr_time_to_merge_in_days
from
  pull_requests pr
  join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
where
  pm.project_name in (${project}) and
  pr.merged_date is not null
  and $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  and pr.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
group by time
order by time

panels.title: Mean Time to Merge over Month

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(distinct case when i.type = 'BUG' then i.id else null end) as 'Bug',
  count(distinct case when i.type != 'BUG' and epic_key != '' then i.id else null end) as 'Strategic',
  count(distinct case when i.type != 'BUG' and epic_key = '' then i.id else null end) as 'Non-Strategic'
from
  issues i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
where
  pm.project_name in (${project}) and
  i.resolution_date is not null and
  date(resolution_date) between
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH

select
  i.priority as 'Priority',
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.created_date, NOW()) / 1440) as 'Average Age'
from
  issues i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
where
  pm.project_name in (${project}) and
  i.status = 'TODO'
  and i.type = 'BUG'
  and i.priority in (${priority})
group by
  i.priority

panels.title: Average Age of Critical Outstanding Defects by Priority

options.content: This dashboard is created based on this [data schema](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/DataModels/DevLakeDomainLayerSchema). Want to add more metrics? Please follow the [guide](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/Configuration/Dashboards/GrafanaUserGuide).

list.definition:
select
  distinct(concat(date_format(DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY), '%Y-%m') , ':', date_format(DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'))) as month
from
  issues i
order by month desc
list.label: Selected Month
list.name: month
list.query:
select
  distinct(concat(date_format(month_timestamp, '%Y-%m') , ':', date_format(month_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d'))) as month
from
  calendar_months
where 
  month_timestamp <= curdate()
order by month desc
limit 12
